title: ফ্যাক্ট চেক: কাশ্মীরে ঈদের দিন পাথরের আঘাতে নিরাপত্তা কর্মী আহত?
subtitle: DailyO.in Bangla is an online opinion and commentary platform which provides current affairs news and informative & in depth articles on politics, sports, lifestyle, science and technology, money, humour,art and architecture.
author: www.dailyo.in
vclaim: We’ve killed a tourist by throwing stones at the vehicle he was travelling in. Let’s try and wrap our heads around the fact that we stoned a tourist, a guest, to death while we glorify these stone pelters & their methods.
